transcript: I just say no you did you threw it out of the window into the grand canal. I don't think I'll ever forgive you for that

segments.text: I just say no you did you threw it out of the window into the grand canal. I don't think I'll ever forgive you for that

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: Yes, I know you did.  You threw it out of the window into the Grand Canal.  I don't think I'll ever forgive you for that.
